name: Zegion
lore: An insect-type monster who serves as one of Rimuru's most powerful subordinates. Possesses incredible combat abilities and serves as a commander of insect-type monsters. Known for his strength and loyalty.
backstory: Zegion is an insect-type monster who evolved through Rimuru's naming and became one of his most powerful subordinates. He serves as a commander and demonstrates incredible combat abilities.
personality: Loyal, powerful, and determined. Zegion is completely devoted to Rimuru and takes great pride in serving as a commander. He is strong and reliable, always ready to fight for Rimuru.
philosophy: Power through loyalty and determination. Believes that true power comes from dedication and loyalty. Advocates for protecting those you serve. Core principle: 'Loyalty creates strength; determination creates victory.'
leadershipStyle: Commanding and loyal - leads through strength and dedication. Maintains discipline while being effective. Makes decisions based on Rimuru's interests and protection.
worldInfluence: Demonstrated the potential of insect-type monsters. His evolution showed the power of naming. Proved that loyalty and determination create powerful subordinates.
alternateScenario: Without Rimuru, Zegion would remain a simple insect or never evolve. The potential of insect-type monsters would be less explored. The power of naming would be less demonstrated.
weaknesses: Can be overly focused on combat

quotes.text: I'll protect Rimuru-sama with my life!
